channel.title: GitHub on FalconBlog
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on FalconBlog

item.title: Day 22
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 22, 2025 â€“ Sunday

  • Updated Profiles: Polished up my LinkedIn and GitHub profiles to reflect my latest work and activities.
  • Readme Revamp: Refreshed my GitHub README.md, making it more representative of my projects and contributions.
  • LaTeX Exploration: Spent time learning LaTeX, understanding the basics and experimenting with academic templates.
  • Academic Prep: Researched and gathered templates related to BTPs and UGRC to stay prepared for upcoming semesters.
  • C++ Practice: Dedicated 2 hours to improving C++ programming skills.

A well-rounded day spent organizing, learning, and prepping for future academic goals.

item.title: Day 11
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 11, 2025 â€“ Wednesday

  • Team Meeting Recap: Conducted another team meeting to reinforce goals and track early progress.
  • Reviewed MoM_1 and Refined Templates: Revisited the previously drafted meeting notes and templates. Refined them for better clarity and usability.
  • Reassigned Tasks if Needed: Adjusted a few tasks based on feedback from team members for better workload distribution.
  • Documented Everything in GitHub: Maintained detailed logs and committed the updates to the project repository.

item.title: Day 10
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 10, 2025 â€“ Tuesday

  • First Online Meeting with the Team: Held the first virtual sync-up. Discussed timelines, expectations, and assigned initial responsibilities to each member.
  • Drafted MoM_1 and Templates: Documented the Minutes of Meeting (MoM_1) and designed reusable templates for future meetings and logs.
  • Task Assignment: Delegated tasks based on everyoneâ€™s strengths and project requirements to ensure a productive week ahead.
  • Documented Everything in GitHub: Committed MoM_1 and templates to GitHub for team visibility and future reference.

item.title: Day 9
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 9, 2025 â€“ Monday

  • Fun Intro Session with Team: Kicked off the project with a light-hearted and engaging introduction session. Helped everyone get comfortable and energized for the journey ahead.
  • Drafted Project Charter: Took the lead in drafting the official project charter to define scope, goals, and roles. A crucial step to align everyone on the same page.
  • Documented Everything in GitHub: Committed the project charter and related documentation to GitHub for transparency, version control, and team access.

item.title: Day 8
item.description:
ðŸš€ June 8, 2025 â€“ Sunday

  • Attended First Ever CP Contest: Participated in my first competitive programming contest. It was a thrilling experience that gave me insight into real-time problem-solving under pressure.
  • Documented the Experience on GitHub: Made a log of the contest, what I solved, and what I learned. This helps track progress and reflect on areas for improvement.
  • Project Tenure as Co-Lead Begins: Officially stepped into the role of project Co-Lead. Started organizing initial thoughts and planning out the first steps for the new responsibilities.
